name: Grilled Beef Skewers with Lemon Rice & Cucumber-Tomato Salad
description: Quickly grilled beef skewers with mild seasoning, served alongside fluffy lemon jasmine rice and a fresh cucumber–tomato salad. Family-friendly, bright, and ready in under 30 minutes.
prep_steps: Rinse jasmine rice under cold water until it runs clear.
Halve and deseed bell peppers; cut into large flat pieces for easy grilling.
Dice cucumber and halve cherry tomatoes; chop parsley.
In a small bowl, whisk olive oil, lemon juice, oregano, salt, and black pepper for salad dressing.
Pat beef skewers dry; brush lightly with olive oil and season with salt and black pepper.
cook_steps: Cook rice: Add rinsed jasmine rice to a pot with water (per pack guidance), a pinch of salt; bring to a boil, then cover and simmer until tender. Fluff and squeeze in a little lemon juice.
Grill bell peppers 3–4 minutes per side until lightly charred and tender; remove and slice.
Grill beef skewers 2–3 minutes per side (turning once) until just cooked to your liking; rest 2 minutes.
Toss cucumber, cherry tomatoes, sliced grilled peppers, and parsley with the lemon-oregano dressing; adjust salt and black pepper.
Plate lemon rice, top with beef skewers, and serve the salad on the side.
